meanings.definition: A person who is in charge of a ship or aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The captans guided the ship safely through the storm.
meanings.sent2: The captans of the plane ensured a smooth flight for the passengers.
meanings.sent3: The captans of the hot air balloon accidentally landed in a zoo!

meanings.sent5: The captans stood tall on the deck, commanding the crew with authority.

meanings.definition: To be in charge of or command something.
meanings.sent1: He captans the team with great leadership skills.

meanings.sent3: The cat tried to captans the toy mouse, thinking it was real!

meanings.definition: The highest-ranking officer on a ship.
meanings.sent1: The captans oversaw all operations on the naval vessel.
meanings.sent2: The crew respected the captans for his experience and wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The captans of the pirate ship had a parrot as a sidekick!
